structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
The Governor, Lieutenant Governor And Council, Certain Officers Under The Governor And Council, And State Library

text.section: the establishment and certification of firefighting standards for recruit firefighters and a uniform training curriculum for all other levels of fire service personnel;
the establishment of requirements for instructors employed in the Massachusetts firefighting academy;
the establishment and promulgation of such rules and regulations for the operation of the Massachusetts firefighting academy;
the location of the Massachusetts firefighting academy and area training centers;
the establishment of standards for conducting training by the Massachusetts firefighting academy; and
an annual review and approval of standards and the courses and curriculum offered by the Massachusetts firefighting academy.
